system.name: This Will Not Stand
system.effect:
Trigger: Your Dragon-Type Pokémon is reduced to 50% of their Maximum HP or below, from above 50% Max HP 
Effect: Your Pokémon becomes Enraged, and gains +1 Combat Stage in each of Attack, Special Attack, and Speed. This Will Not Stand may trigger only once per Scene per Pokémon.
system.prerequisites: Tyrant's Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Master
